name: Carpoon
description:
Harpoon cars and tow them in to the recycling center to get more fuel to continue.

Run out of fuel and it's game over!

Keyboard + Mouse Controls: WASD + Mouse + Left click

Controller Setup: 

Steering: Left stick  |  Aiming: Right stick 

 Shoot or Release harpoon: Left Trigger

___________________________________________________________________________________________
